vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to shudder, shiver, dread, bristle (with horror), be very afraid
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to bristle (with horror)
1a2) to dread
§ 1) to shudder, shiver, dread, bristle (with horror), be very afraid
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to bristle (with horror)
1a2) to dread
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   estremecerse; (b)   saber, conocer; (c)   desgarrar, arrancar; (d) nif.   tempestuoso; (e) pi.   arrancar, arrebatar; (f) hitp.   lanzarse como una tormenta contra
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 因恐懼而毛髮直立
1a) (Qal) 因恐懼而毛髮直立
2) 吹走, 掃走, 捲走
2a) (Qal)
2a1) 掃走
2a2) 吹走(上帝對惡人的行動) (比喻用法)
2b) (Niphal) (分詞) 狂暴的 #詩 50:3|
2c) (Piel) 捲走, 吹走 #伯 27:21|
2d) (Hithpael) 如風暴般而來 #但 11:40|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 因恐惧而毛发直立
1a) (Qal) 因恐惧而毛发直立
2) 吹走, 扫走, 卷走
2a) (Qal)
2a1) 扫走
2a2) 吹走(上帝对恶人的行动) (比喻用法)
2b) (Niphal) (分词) 狂暴的 #诗 50:3|
2c) (Piel) 卷走, 吹走 #伯 27:21|
2d) (Hithpael) 如风暴般而来 #但 11:40|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
1) to storm away, sweep away, whirl away
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to sweep away
1a2) to storm away (of God's action against the wicked) (fig)
1b) (Niphal) to be stormy, be tempestuous (exceedingly)
1c) (Piel) to whirl away, be stormed away
1d) (Hithpael) to storm against, come as a storm
§ 1) to storm away, sweep away, whirl away
1a) (Qal)
1a1) to sweep away
1a2) to storm away (of God's action against the wicked) (fig)
1b) (Niphal) to be stormy, be tempestuous (exceedingly)
1c) (Piel) to whirl away, be stormed away
1d) (Hithpael) to storm against, come as a storm
